alert.note: Alert for Chiriaco Summit; Joshua Tree NP East; Joshua Tree NP West (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 14 at 9:39AM PST until February 15 at 7:00PM PST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM MST /9 AM PST/ TO 8 PM MST /7 PM PST/ TUESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...In Arizona, Kofa, Yuma, Central La Paz County, Southeast Yuma County and Gila River Valley. In California, Western portion of Joshua Tree National Park, Eastern portion of Joshua Tree National Park and Chiriaco Summit. * WHEN...From 10 AM MST /9 AM PST/ to 8 PM MST /7 PM PST/ Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Difficult driving conditions, especially for larger vehicles traveling along roads with crosswinds. Light, unsecured objects may become airborne. Briefly lowered visibilities at times in blowing dust or blowing sand.
info.instruction: A Wind Advisory means that sustained wind speeds of between 30 and 40 mph are expected, or wind gusts of between 40 and 58 mph. Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. In addition, strong winds over desert areas could result in briefly lowered visibilities to well under a mile at times in blowing dust or blowing sand. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Chiriaco Summit; Joshua Tree NP East; Joshua Tree NP West
